EmailTemplate.description: This template should be used for Republic correspondence when the other templates available do not work for the type of request/email response you are sending.
EmailTemplate.name: Vendor: Standard Republic (CE Email Templates)
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Case_Type__c}- {!Case.Case_Subtype_Email_Format__c} - {!Case.Location_Code__c} - Ref. #: {!Case.Reference_Number__c}, Acct. #: {!Asset.Vendor_Account_Number__c}
